SA11n1122:12: yaḥ śrotā, vaktavyaḥ sa yāvanmātreṇa dhvanitārtha jānāti,
SA11n1122:28: anunnahanatā acapalatā acañcalatā saumyatā guptatā karmaṇyatā ājāneyatā ekāgratā ekārāmatā saṃgaṇikāvarjanatā vivekaratiḥ kāyavivekaścittāvibhramo'raṇyamukhamanasikāratā alpecchatā |
SA11n1122:29: yāvadīryāpathaguptiḥ kālajñatā samayajñatā mātrajñatā muktijñatā subharatā supoṣatetyādi ||
SA11n1122:35: evaṃ cāsya bhavati-idaṃ mayā samādhimukhaṃ sarvadharmayathābhūtadarśanaṃ ca sarvasattvānāṃ niṣpādayitavyam |
SA11n1122:36: sa tayā mahākaruṇā saṃcodyamāno'dhiśīlamadhicittamadhiprajñaṃ ca śikṣāṃ paripūrya caturāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate- tasmānmayā śīlasusthitenāprakampenāśithilena bhavitavyamiti |
SA11n1122:37: idaṃ śamathamāhātmyamātmanaḥ pareṣāṃ ca anantāpāyādiduḥkhasamatikramānantalaukikalokottarasukhasaṃpatprakarṣapāraprāptyātmakamavagamya tadabhilāṣeṇātāpo bhāvayitavyaḥ ādīptagṛhāntargateneva śītalajalābhilāṣiṇā |
SA11n1122:43: ata eva ugraparipṛcchāyāṃ gṛhiṇaṃ bodhisattvamadhikṛtyoktam-tena surāmaireyamadyapramādasthānāt prativiratena bhavitavyamamattenānunmattenācapalenācañcalenāsaṃbhrāntenāmukhareṇānunnaḍenānuddhatenopasthitasmṛtinā saṃprajanyeneti |
SA11n1122:45: tatra smṛtiḥ āryaratnacūḍasūtre'bhihitā-yayā smṛtyā sarvakleśānāṃ prādurbhāvo na bhavati |
SA11n1122:47: yayā smṛtyā utpathe vā kumārge vā na patati |
SA11n1122:48: yayā smṛtyā dauvārikabhūtayā sarveṣāmakuśalānāṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇāmavakāśaṃ na dadāti |
SA11n1122:54: yathā yathā cāsya kāyaḥ sthito bhavati,
SA11n1122:57: so'tikrāman vā pratikrāman vā saṃprajānacārī bhavati |
SA11n1122:58: ālokite saṃmiñjjite prasārite saṃghāṭīpaṭṭapātracīvaradhāraṇe aśite pīte khādite nidrāklamaprativinodane āgate gate sthite niṣaṇṇe supte jāgarite bhāṣite tūṣṇībhāve pratisaṃlayane saṃprajānacārī bhavatīti ||
SA11n1122:61: kṣipraṃ samādhiṃ labhate niraṅgaṇaṃ viśuddhaśīlasmimi ānuśaṃsāḥ || iti ||
SA11n1122:62: ato'vagamyate- ye kecitsamādhihetavaḥ prayogāste śīlāntargatā iti |
SA11n1122:75: citte parijñāte sarvadharmāḥ parijñātā bhavanti | api tu -
SA11n1122:76: cittena nīyate lokaḥ cittaṃ cittaṃ na paśyati |
SA11n1122:77: cittena cīyate karma śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham ||
SA11n1122:86: tathā āryadharmasaṃgītisūtre'pyuktam-mativikramo bodhisattva āha-yo'yaṃ dharmo dharma ityucyate,
SA11n1122:87: nāyaṃ dharmo deśastho na pradeśastho'nyatra svacittādhīno dharmaḥ |
SA11n1122:88: tasmānmayā svacittaṃ svārādhitaṃ svadhiṣṭhitaṃ susamārabdhaṃ sunigṛhītaṃ kartavyam |
SA11n1122:92: tatra bodhisattvo doṣebhyaścittaṃ nivārya guṇeṣu pravartayati ||
SA11n1122:94: ayaṃ bhagavan dharmaṃ samādadānaḥ sukhābhisaṃbodhāya saṃvartata iti ||
SA11n1122:98: tasya mama kulaputra evaṃ bhavati- svacittamevopastambhayitavyaṃ sarvakuśalamūlaiḥ |
SA11n1122:103: tathā atraiva māyādevyadarśanākulībhūte āryasudhane ratnanetrāyā nagaradevatāyāstadṛrśanārthamiyamanuśāsanī- cittanagaraparipālanakuśalena te kulaputra bhavitavyaṃ sarvasaṃsāraviṣayaratyasaṃvasanatayā |
SA11n1122:112: yāvadevaṃ cittanagaraviśuddhayamiyuktena kulaputra bodhisattvena śakyaṃ sarvakuśalamūlasamārjanamanuprāptum |
SA11n1122:114: tathā hi tasya bodhisattvasyaivaṃ cittanagarapariśuddhasya sarvāvaraṇāni purato na saṃtiṣṭhinte |
SA11n1122:119: asaṃprajanyaparatantrasya muṣitasmṛteśca cittaṃ calati samīhitādālambanādanyatra nīyamānatvāt |
SA11n1122:120: yadā tu smṛtisaṃprajanyena bāhyāśceṣṭā nivartitā bhavanti,
SA11n1122:123: adyatve'pi ca satvārthakṣamo bhavatyeva prasādakaratvāt | katham?
SA11n1122:126: etadeva ca bodhisattvasya kṛtyaṃ yaduta sattvāvarjanam |
SA11n1122:127: yathā āryadharmasaṃgītisūtre āryapriyadarśanena bodhisattvena paridīpitam- tathā tathā bhagavan bodhisattvena pratipattavyaṃ yatsahadarśanenaiva sattvāḥ prasīdeyuḥ |
SA11n1122:132: anādeyaṃ tu taṃ lokaḥ paribhūya jināṅkuram |
SA11n1122:139: iti | yathāha- katame ca te bodhisattvasamudācārāḥ?
SA11n1122:145: sa sarvasattvānurakṣayā ātmanaśca bodhisaṃbhāraparipūraṇārthaṃ saṃpanneryāpatho bhavati,
SA11n1122:146: mṛdubhāṇī mandabhāṇī asaṃsargabahulaḥ pravivekābhimukhaḥ suprasannamukha iti ||
SA11n1122:147: ata eva dharmasaṃgītisūtre deśitam-yaḥ sattvān rakṣati,
SA11n1122:149: anayā kanīyena mātṛgrāmeṇa saha rahovasthādiṣu lokarakṣā ca kṛtā syāt |
SA11n1122:150: evaṃ bhogyeṣu jalasthaleṣu mūtrapurīṣaśrleṣmapūyādīnāṃ kutsitānāṃ rahasyarahasi cotsargaṃ na kuryāddevamanuṣyacittarakṣārtham ||
SA11n1122:151: saddharmasmṛtyupasthāne ca raha utsiṣṭaṃ kṛtvā anutsiṣṭāhāreṣvadadataḥ pretagatiḥ paṭhayate ||
SA11n1122:152: tathā bodhisattvaprātimokṣe'pyaprasādaparihāra uktaḥ- na purato dantakāṣṭhaṃ khāditavyaṃ na purataḥ khelo nikṣiptavya iti ||
SA11n1122:153: eṣa ca gauravalajjāvidhiḥ sarvadraṣṭavyo na brahmacāriṣveva |
SA11n1122:154: atra tu sūtre brahmacāryadhikāraḥ teṣu gurutarāpattibhayasaṃdarśanārtham ||
SA11n1122:157: tathā brahmaparipṛcchāyāmapyuktam- na ca vadhakasadṛśena bodhisattvena bhavitavyamiti |
SA11n1122:162: evaṃ svayamapyutprekṣya dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca lokāprasādaṃ rakṣet |
SA11n1122:176: āryatathāgataguhyasūtre'pyāha- na khalu punaḥ kulaputra bodhisattvasya vāg raktā vā duṣṭā vā mūḍhā vā kliṣṭā vā kṣuṇṇavyākaraṇā vā svapakṣotkarṣaṇavacanā vā,
SA11n1122:182: āryadaśabhūmakasūtre'pyuktam-yeyaṃ vāgamanojñā svasaṃtānaparasaṃtānavināśanī tathārūpāṃ vācaṃ prahāya,
SA11n1122:183: yeyaṃ vāk snigdhā mṛdvī manojñā madhurā priyakaraṇī manaāpakaraṇī hitakaraṇī karṇasukhā hṛdayaṃgamā premaṇī varṇaviṣpaṣṭā vijñeyā śravaṇīyā aniśritā bahujanakāntā bahujanapriyā bahujanamanaāpā vijñapraśastā sarvasattvahitasukhāvahā manautplāvakarī manaḥprahlādanakarī svaparasaṃtānapramodanakarī rāgadveṣamohasarvakleśapraśamanī,
SA11n1122:188: dharmasaṃgītisūtre'pyuktam-gaganagañjo bodhisattva āha- na bodhisattvenaiṣā vāgbhāṣitavyā yayā paro vyāpadyeta |
SA11n1122:189: na sā vāgbhāṣitavyā yayā paraṃ tāpayet |
SA11n1122:190: na bodhisattvena sā vāgbhāṣitavyā yatparo jānīyāt |
SA11n1122:192: na bodhisattvena sā vāgbhāṣitavyā yayā na vidyāmutpādayet |
SA11n1122:193: na sā vāgbhāṣitavyā yā sattvānāṃ na hṛdayaṃgamā na paurī na karṇasukhā,
SA11n1122:195: saṃkṣepatastu parāprasādarakṣā āryasāgaramatisūtre deśitā-apara ekadharmo mahāyānasaṃgrahāya saṃvartate-svaskhalitapratyavekṣaṇatayā sarvasattvānurakṣeti ||
SA11n1122:199: asya tu granthavistarasyāyaṃ piṇḍārtho bodhisattvena manasā nityaṃ dhārayitavyaḥ-
SA11n1122:209: tatra satatabhaiṣajyamadhikṛtya āryaratnameghe'bhihitam- tasmātpiṇḍapātrādekaṃ pratyaṃśaṃ sabrahmacāriṇāṃ sthāpayati |
SA11n1122:210: dvitīyaṃ duḥkhitānāṃ tṛtīyaṃ vinipatitānāṃ caturthamātmanā paribhuṅkte |
SA11n1122:218: tena taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhujya kuśalapakṣāmi mukhena bhavitavyamityādi ||
SA11n1122:219: āryaratnarāśāvapyuktam-tena grāmaṃ vā nagaraṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya caratā dharmasaṃnāhaṃ saṃnahyapiṇḍāya cartavyam |
SA11n1122:223: evaṃ manaāpāmanaāpeṣu śabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyeṣu vijñapteṣu nānunetavyaṃ na pratihantavyam |
SA11n1122:225: dāntājāneyacittena pūrvadharmamanasikāramanutsṛjatā nāmiṣaprakṣiptayā saṃtatyā piṇḍāya cartavyam,
SA11n1122:227: yataśca piṇḍapāto labhyate tatrānunayo na kartavyaḥ |
SA11n1122:228: yataśca na labhyate tatra pratighāto notpādayitavyaḥ |
SA11n1122:229: daśakulapraveśe na caikādaśātkulād bhikṣā na labhyate |
SA11n1122:231: evaṃ ca cittamutpādayitavyam- evaṃ bahukṛtyā hyete śramaṇabrāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ |
SA11n1122:238: tatra maitrīkaruṇācittamutpādayitavyam-tathāhaṃ kariṣyāmi yathā ye me sattvāścakṣuṣā ābhāsamāgacchanti,
SA11n1122:242: tena lūhaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vāpiṇḍapātaṃ saṃgṛhya samantāccaturdiśaṃ vyavalokayitavyam-ka iha grāmanagaranigame daridraḥ sattvaḥ,
SA11n1122:244: yadi daridraṃ sattvaṃ paśyati tena tatpiṇḍapātātsaṃvibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ |
SA11n1122:246: tenaivaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam-santyanābhāsagatāḥ sattvā ye mama cakṣuṣa ābhāsaṃ nāgacchanti |
SA11n1122:249: tena tatpiṇḍapātaṃ gṛhītvā tadaraṇyāyatanamabhiruhya dhautapāṇinā śobhanasamācāreṇa śramaṇacāritrakalpasamanvāgatenādhiṣṭhānadhiṣṭhitena paryaṅkaṃ baddhā sa pīṇḍapātaḥ paribhoktavyaḥ |
SA11n1122:251: paribhuñjatā caivaṃ manasikāra utpādayitavyaḥ- santyasmin kāye'śītiḥ krimikulasahastrāṇi |
SA11n1122:256: tenaivaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam-lūhāhāratayā me laghuḥ kāyo bhaviṣyati prahāṇakṣamaḥ,
SA11n1122:263: tataḥ piṇḍapātādanyatarāyāṃ śilāyāmavatīryaivaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam-ye kecinmṛgapakṣisaṃghā āmiṣabhojanenārthikāste dattādānāḥ paribhuñjantāmiti ||
SA11n1122:273: tena naivaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam- puruṣo me piṇḍapātaṃ dadāti na strī |
SA11n1122:274: strī me piṇḍapātaṃ dadāti na puruṣaḥ |
SA11n1122:275: dārako me piṇḍapātaṃ dadāti na dārikā |
SA11n1122:276: dārikā me piṇḍapātaṃ dadāti na dārakaḥ |
SA11n1122:286: peyālaṃ prāyeṇa hi sattvā rasagṛddhā bhojanahetoḥ pāpāni karmāṇi kṛtvā narakeṣupadyante |
SA11n1122:287: ye ye punaḥ saṃtuṣṭā agṛddhā alolupā rasapratiprastrabdhā jihvendriyasaṃtuṣṭāḥ kiyallūhenāpi bhojanena yāpayanti,
SA11n1122:288: teṣāṃ cyutānāṃ kālagatānāṃ svargopapattirbhavati sugatigamanaṃ bhavati devamanuṣyeṣu |
SA11n1122:290: evaṃ kāśyapa piṇḍacārikeṇa bhikṣuṇā rasatṛṣṇāṃ vinivartayitvā nidhyāptacitena suparipakkān kulmāṣān paribhuñjatā na paritaptavyam |
SA11n1122:294: yadi punaḥ kāśyapa piṇḍacāriko bhikṣurmeghākulavṛṣṭikālasamaye vartamāne na śakruyāt piṇḍāyāvatartum,
SA11n1122:295: tena maitryāhārasaṃnaddhena dharmacintāmanasikārapratiṣṭhitena dvirātraṃ trirātraṃ vā bhaktacchandacchinnena evaṃ saṃjñā utpādayitavyā- santi yāmalaukikāḥ pretā duṣkarakarmakāriṇo ye varṣaśatena khelapiṇḍamapyāhāraṃ na pratilabhante |
SA11n1122:296: tanmayā dharmayoniśaścintāpratiṣṭhitena kāyadaurvalyaṃ vā cittadaurbalyaṃ vā notpādayitavyam |
SA11n1122:300: yatra kule piṇḍapātaṃ śuciṃ kārayettatra kule āsane nipadya dhārmī kathā kartavyā |
SA11n1122:306: yatpareṣāmevaṃ vācaṃ bhāṣate- lūho me piṇḍapāto rūkṣo me piṇḍapāta āsīt |
SA11n1122:314: yatpātre patitaṃ lūhaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā aśubhaṃ vā śubhaṃ vā ,
SA11n1122:317: tathā āryograparipṛcchāyāmapyuktam- yasyāścāntike piṇḍapātaṃ paribhujya na śakrotyātmanaḥ parasya cārthaṃ paripūrayitum,
SA11n1122:322: tathā hyuktam- māṃsaṃ sarvamabhakṣyaṃ kṛpātmano bodhisattvasyeti vadāmi |peyālaṃ ||
SA11n1122:325: māṃsāni ca palāṇḍūṃśca madyāni vividhāni ca |
SA11n1122:326: gṛñjanaṃ laśunaṃ caiva yogī nityaṃ vivarjayet ||
SA11n1122:329: lābhārthaṃ hanyate prāṇī māṃsārthaṃ dīyate dhanam |
SA11n1122:333: te yānti paramaṃ ghoraṃ narakaṃ pāpakāriṇaḥ |
SA11n1122:336: acoditaṃ ca naivāsti tasmānmāṃsaṃ na bhakṣayet ||
SA11n1122:337: māṃsaṃ na bhakṣayedyogī mayā buddhaiśca garhitam |
SA11n1122:346: khādate yadi nirlajja unmatto jāyate sadā ||
SA11n1122:347: brahmaṇeṣu ca jāyate athavā yogināṃ kule |
SA11n1122:356: mātrayā pratikūlaṃ ca yogī piṇḍaṃ samācaret ||
SA11n1122:372: vinaye'pi yadanujñātaṃ tattu trikoṭipariśuddhabhakṣaṇe na prahāṇāntarāya iti tatparityāgena śuddhadṛṣṭīnāmabhimānanirāsārtham |
SA11n1122:374: tathā hyuktaṃ laṅkāvatārasūtre- tatra tatra deśanāpāṭhe śikṣāpadānāmānupūrvī badhnanniśreṇīpadavinyāsayogena |
SA11n1122:376: tatra uddiśya kṛtāni pratiṣiddhāni tato'ntaśaḥ prakṛtimṛtānyapi pratiṣiddhānīti ||
SA11n1122:379: śrāvakavinaye'pi tāvadātmārthaṃ brahmacaryavāsārthaṃ pātracīvaramapi vikrīya kāyasaṃdhāraṇamuktam,
SA11n1122:382: tatpradarśanārthaṃ ca bhagavatā tatra svayaṃ bhaiṣajyopayogaḥ pradarśitaḥ ||
SA11n1122:383: uktaṃ ca āryaratnameghasūtre- tairyadā pracāritaṃ bhavati,
SA11n1122:384: tadā satyāṃ velāyāmasatyāṃ vā teṣāmimānyevaṃrūpāṇi kāyopastambhanānyupakaraṇāni na labhyante'bhyavahartum- yaduta sarpirvā tailaṃ vā mūlaraso vā gaṇḍaraso vā phalaraso vā |
SA11n1122:386: yadi punaḥ khalu paścādbhaktiko bodhisattvo vā glāno bhavati,
SA11n1122:387: yathārūpeṇāsya glānyena jīvitāntarāyo bhavati kuśalapakṣāntarāyo vā,
SA11n1122:388: tena niṣkaukṛtyena bhūtvā nirvicikitsakena bhaiṣajyacittamupasthāpya pratinisevyānīti ||
SA11n1122:390: naḥ pracchādanārtha tu śramaṇaliṅgasaṃdarśanārthamimāni ca kāṣāyāṇi devamānuṣāsurasya lokasya caityamiti caityārtha samyagdhāritavyāni |
SA11n1122:397: etāni ca kāṣāyāṇyāryamārgasaṃbhārānukūlānīti kṛtvā tathā kariṣyāmo yathā naikakṣaṇamapi sakaṣāyāḥ kāye kāṣāyāṇi dhārayiṣyāma iti ||
SA11n1122:399: ye punaste kāśyapa vai daryā[rpāt] asaṃyatā itaḥ śramaṇaguṇadharmādudurāḥ kāye kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi dhārayanti,
SA11n1122:402: tatra kaśyapa pratyekanarake śramaṇarūpapratirūpeṇa tāḥ kāraṇāḥ kāryante ādīptacailā ādīptaśīrṣā ādīptapātrā ādīptāsanā ādīptaśayanāḥ |
SA11n1122:406: āryaratnameghe'pyuktam- yadi bhavedabhyavakāśiko bodhisattvo glānakāyo'prativalakāyastena vihārasthitenaivaṃ citamutpādayitavyam- kleśapratipakṣārthaṃ tathāgatena dhutaguṇāḥ prajñaptāḥ |
SA11n1122:408: yathā vihārastha eva kleśānāṃ prahāṇāya ghaṭiṣyāmi |
SA11n1122:409: tatra ca vihāre na gṛddhimutpādayāmi nādhyavasānam |
SA11n1122:410: evaṃ cāsya bhavati- kartavyo dānapatīnāmanugraho nāsmābhirātmabharibhirbhavitavyamiti ||
SA11n1122:411: punaratraivāha- te śayyāṃ kalpayanto dakṣiṇena pārśvena śayyāṃ kalpayanti |
SA11n1122:412: pādasyopari pādamādhāya cīvarai susaṃvṛtakāyāḥ smṛtāḥ saṃprajānānā utthānasaṃjñina ālokasaṃjñinaḥ śayyāṃ kalpayanti |
SA11n1122:414: na pārśvasukhamanyatra yāvadevaiṣāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ sthitaye yāpanāyai |
SA11n1122:422: āryaratnarāśisūtre'pi bhagavatā śraddhādeyaparibhoge parikīrtite-atha tasyāmeva parṣadi yogācārāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ dve śate imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā prarudite |
SA11n1122:423: evaṃ ca vācamabhāṣantakālaṃ vayaṃ bhagavan kariṣyāmo na punaraprāptaphalā ekapiṇḍapātamapi śraddhādeyasya paribhokṣyāmaḥ |
SA11n1122:424: bhagavānāha- sādhu sādhu kulaputrā evaṃrūpairlajjibhiḥ kaukṛtyasaṃpannaiḥ paralokāvadyabhayadarśibhiridaṃ pravacanaṃ śobhate |
SA11n1122:428: yadi bhikṣavo bhikṣuryukto yogācāro mama śikṣāyāṃ pratipannaḥ sarvasaṃskāreṣvanityadarśī sarvasaṃskāraduḥkhaviditaḥ sarvadharmeṣvanātmādhimuktiḥ śāntanirvāṇābhikāṅkṣī sumerumātrairālopaiḥ śraddhādeyaṃ bhuñjīta,
SA11n1122:430: yeṣāṃ ca dāyakānāṃ dānapatīnāṃ sakāśācchraddhādeyaṃ paribhuktaṃ tatasteṣāṃ dāyakadānapatīnāṃ maharddhikaḥ puṇyavipāko bhavati mahādyutikaḥ |
SA11n1122:433: tatra kāśyapa yo bhikṣurdāyakasya dānapaterantikāccīvarapiṇḍapātaṃ paribhujya apramāṇaṃ cetaḥsamādhiṃ samāpadyate,
SA11n1122:436: na tveva tasya puṇyaniṣyandasya kaścitkṣaya iti ||
SA11n1122:437: tadevaṃ piṇḍapātagamanārambhe bhojanārambhe vā triṣu sthāneṣu smṛtirupasthāpyā dāyakānugrahe,
SA11n1122:442: tatrāpi tāvadimāṃ trisamayarājoktāṃ vidyāṃ maṇḍalasamayārthamuccārayet-namaḥ sarvabuddhabodhisattvānām |
SA11n1122:463: anena ādikarmikā api sattveṣvanantaṃ buddhakṛtyaṃ kurvanti ||
SA11n1122:464: ayameva paramāṃ rakṣāṃ mārādibhyaḥ sarva duṣṭebhyaḥ karoti |
SA11n1122:465: hastatāḍena bhasmanā sarṣapairudakena dṛṣṭayā manasā vā sīmāvandhaṃ karoti ||
SA11n1122:467: vanakusumāni vā caitye pratimāyāṃ saddharma pustake vā samāhito nivedayet |
SA11n1122:469: buddhabodhisattvālambanena sarvasattvārthābhilāṣiṇā ca cittena bhadracarividhipūrvakaṃ ca japtavyaḥ |
SA11n1122:479: bodhicittaṃ dṛḍhaṃ yasya niḥsaṅgā ca matirbhavet |
SA11n1122:480: vicikitsā naiva kartavyā tasyedaṃ sidhyati dhruvam || iti ||
SA11n1122:491: kiṃ tu śraddhāvegaṃ bodhicittavegaṃ sarvotsargavegaṃ ca pramāṇīkṛtyāvicārataḥ pravartitavyam |
SA11n1122:493: athavā anena sarvavajradharamantreṇa rakṣāṃ kuryāt-namastraiyabdhikānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ sarvavajradharāṇāṃ caṇḍāla 2 |
SA11n1122:503: namo'stu te agrograśāsanānāṃ raṇaṃ 2 haṃ phula sphāṭa vajrottame svāhā ||
SA11n1122:506: bhojanapānaśayanāsanavasanapūjopakaraṇāni cābhimantritena jalena dṛṣṭayā manasā vā rakṣeta |
SA11n1122:508: idaṃ ca tat- namaḥ samantavajrāṇāṃ trāṭa |
SA11n1122:546: imāni ca mantrapadāni sarpasya purato na vaktavyāni,
SA11n1122:574: iti hi bhikṣavo jāṅgulyāṃ vidyāyāṃ udāhṛtāyāṃ sarvabhūtasamāgate sarvaṃ tathāvitathānanyathābhūtaṃ satyamaviparītamaviparyastam |
SA11n1122:616: imāmapi vidyāmanantajātismarahetuṃ mahāprabhāvāṃ saptapañcāśadakṣarāṃ vidyādharapiṭakopanibaddhāṃ sarvabhayarakṣārtha prayuñjīta |
SA11n1122:642: sattvasvāmikaistu bhogaiḥ sattvasvāmika evātmabhāvaḥ saṃrakṣata ityadoṣaḥ |
SA11n1122:643: na hi dāsasya nityaṃ svāmikarmavyāpṛtasya svadravyamasti yena varteta ||
SA11n1122:644: uktaṃ ca dharmasaṃgītisūtre-dāsopamena bodhisattvena bhavitavyaṃ sarvasattvakiṃkaraṇīyaprāpaṇatayeti ||
SA11n1122:645: na caikāntasvāmyarthaparasya dāsasya vyādhyādiviklavamateḥ svāminamananujñāpyāpi bhuñjānasya kaściddoṣaḥ |
SA11n1122:650: tasya spaṣṭāvabodhārthamayaṃ nyāyo'bhiyukto na tu svārthāpekṣayeti ||
